metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1960 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the t2p_process_jpeg_strip function in tiff2pdf in libtiff 4.0.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted TIFF image file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
libtiff-tools - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
libtiff5 - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.2-4ubuntu3').
